extendedInfo.description: EmailTray is a real time-saver because it solves email overload: it receives email from all of your email accounts and separates email that is worth your attention. It rescues mis-filtered good email from spam and returns to priority folders.EmailTray for Android is a mobile extension of the Windows-based EmailTray for desktop, so there is a smart technology behind it. Unlike other email clients, EmailTray is based on an intelligent algorithm that identifies email priorities and distributes messages into folders according to those priorities. It will also signal to the user about the number of top priority messages via sound, vibration or light and also by means of an icon (screen widget).The EmailTray screen widget shows sorted email in three folders:âTop priorityâ for important messages,âLow priorityâ for less important messages, andâNo priorityâ for messages of unknown/doubtful priority.If you open the application, you will also see a spam folder where you can check and delete all your spam messages from all your accounts in one place, and delete them all at the same time. This means you can arrive at work in the morning and already have a clean inbox and an empty spam box.The main features of EmailTray are:- Multiple email account support- Automatic mail sorting by sender priority- Good email rescue from spam- Messages grouped by date or sender- Instant notifications about top priority new mail (sound, vibration, light)- A functional widget on the home screen that notifies you about the number of priority emails- Access to EmailTray can be password-protected- Full support for POP3 and IMAP (including push notifications)- Pictures, music and other content sharing via email

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I\'m a user of this app on PC too. This looks so neat and clean. Just after outlook I like this most. Thanks for bringing it to android platform.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Got potential but...
reviews.comment: This is definitely a beyond average email app,  but personally i don\'t feel that it\'s developed for heavy email users. Sometimes it could get a bit confusing and unease to use. For now im sticking with keiten but will check back later on if it got some sweet updates
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t delete trash
reviews.comment: A brill app which is beyond anything available. My only dislike is you have to delete the trash items individually. Please introduce an Empty Trash function.
reviews.author: Richard Swain

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: Used for a few days, good.lay out.....used to replace my hotmail, which changed back to outlook ! Which is awful ! Anyway.... can you tell me how to fix, (or can you fix), the constant Pop up asking me to re log in... When i\'m already logged in !.becoming annoying. Thanks would give 5 stars then ! :)
reviews.author: C Harris

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Simple and works with Yahoo, which many mail apps do not do well. 5 stars if you can bypass the priority folders, and also if it doesn\'t force close when trying to add another account.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No push messaging on Yahoo or Gmail
reviews.comment: Sooo, it\'s a useless app for me.
reviews.author: Karbin Kopy

reviews.title: Irritating
reviews.comment: Keeps say authentication error even there is network ,all my apps are working properly with my network except emailtray ,please I don\'t want to regret installing it ,can u fix this urgently
reviews.author: Tebogo Michael

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I had over 7000 unread email spam and unread inbox I was able to delete All of my  messages at the  same time all at  once.
reviews.author: Dmell Burnes

reviews.title: Galaxy note
reviews.comment: It works perfectly in my phone. I have several accounts and I love this app because it is more than easy to use all of them using the app.
reviews.author: Hayk Khachatryan

reviews.title: Nice email app
reviews.comment: Add a few features to get 5 stars.  Sort by- need to be able to sort by sender.  Change font  size. Pinch to zoom like all other apps.  Foldering - need to move mail into folders.   Nice start to this app.  One of the better email apps out there.
reviews.author: Chris Zema

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Just wish there was an option to save the email!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Arun
reviews.comment: I am getting an error message while checking mail. \'ERR Exceeded the login limit for a 15 min\'  Pls help
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: I want to customize my notification tone.
reviews.author: A Hythe

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Looks amazing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: There needs to be an option to delete your spam and trash in one touch. It is too cumbersome to delete the hundreds of emails I get!!!
reviews.author: Christine Ford

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Does not work at all, does not get messages and crashing when trying to open email account settings, uninstalling...
reviews.author: Ig Fr

reviews.title: Half works
reviews.comment: I\'m unable to set up my Yahoo business email (IMAP or POP3). It is currently setup on 2 other apps. I\'m going to try my godaddy business email (also setup on 2 other apps). I was able to setup a gmail account.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Garbage
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: I could only get 2 accounts to link.
reviews.author: Janette Lambert
